especificaciones.textoSubencabezado: Development of digital media and brand language with a creative process.Thinking from what your client want’s.

subTextos.branding: logos, lbrand language, colors, graphic pieces.
subTextos.paginasWeb: landing page, e-commerce, robust web pages (programación), UI/UX. Creative Processes: design thinking
subTextos.procesosCreativos: design thinking y procesos creativos a la medida de cada marca/idea.
subTextos.analisisDeClientes: design process to understand what your potential client want now and in the future.

subTextos.1: of big companies know that user experience will be their competitive advantage.
subTextos.2: of big companies know that a good design leads to more sales and more afnity with their clients.
subTextos.3: of the big companies plan to increase their design staff in the next 12 months.
subTextos.4: Source - KPCB Design in Tech Report, NEA Future of Design Report.
